creator: Ferran Catalán
descriptionHtml:
Clever count down, keep it simple and use it just for what has born, the countdown for games.

- Every tap on the screen the countdown is restarted.
- Use proximity sensor to reset the countdown
- Sound at the end of the countdown.
- Define amount of seconds to countdown
- Clean and minimalistic design.
- Pause button.

Perfect for a board game!
descriptionShort: Keep it simple and use it just for what was born, the countdown.
title: Countdown Games (Rummikub)

title: Countdown Games (Rummikub)

creator: COLECTIBO
descriptionHtml:
Like an hourglass, but more accurate, easier to use and more of the 21st century. This app is as simple as its objective: that we forget to be aware of controlling the time and concentrate on making the best move of the game.

- Each press on the screen resets the timer.
- Emit a sound to warn that time is running out.
- Set the playing time of each game.



Perfect for a board game!
descriptionShort: Control the time of each player in your favorite board games

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Keep pressing the screen to stop countdown
